alert.note: Alert for Lackawanna; Luzerne; Northern Wayne; Pike; Southern Wayne; Wyoming (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Binghamton (South Central New York and Northeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued February 03 at 1:32AM EST by NWS Binghamton
info.description: ...A SNOW SQUALL WILL AFFECT PARTS OF SOUTHERN WAYNE...WYOMING... NORTHERN WAYNE...LUZERNE...LACKAWANNA...AND PIKE COUNTIES... HAZARDS...A snow squall accompanied by winds of up to 30 MPH which can rapidly reduce visibility to less than one mile. LOCATION AND MOVEMENT...At 132 AM EST, a snow squall was along a line extending from near Narrowsburg to near Ricketts Glen State Park and moving southeast at 35 MPH. LOCATIONS IMPACTED INCLUDE... Scranton, Wilkes-Barre, Falls, Hazleton, Muhlenberg, Dunmore, Kingston, Nanticoke, Plains and Carbondale. This includes the following highway exits... Interstate 80 between 256 and 273. Pennsylvania Interstate 81 between 143 and 199. Interstate 84 between 1 and 53. Interstate 380 between 20 and 24. Interstate 476 between 105 and 131. SAFETY INFO... Use extra caution if you must travel into or through this squall. Rapid changes in visibility and potentially slick roads may lead to accidents. &&

area.areaDesc: Lackawanna; Luzerne; Northern Wayne; Pike; Southern Wayne; Wyoming
